def generateArray(nums):
    max_num = max(nums)
    min_num = min(nums)
    max_diff = max_num / 0.2
    adjusted_min_num = max_num - max_diff
    return [adjusted_min_num, max_num]

    return [adjusted_min_num, max_num]
